news.title: Washington State Keeps Enforcing Net Neutrality as it Hails FCC Court Loss
news.description: Following an appellate court decision to vacate the FCC’s attempt to preempt state net neutrality laws, Washington is still enforcing its 2018 net neutrality statute.

news.title: Tech Giants Shift Profits to Avoid Taxes. There’s a Plan to Stop Them.
news.description: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development has proposed a system for allowing countries to tax large international corporations doing business outside their borders.

news.title: FBI Misused Surveillance Data, Spied on Its Own, FISA Ruling Finds
news.description: A US Foreign Intelligence Service Act court ruling from October 2018 indicates that FBI employees improperly used data to research colleagues and family members.

news.title: Apple Removes App Used in Hong Kong Protests After Pressure From China
news.description: A crowdsourced mapping app popular in Hong Kong has been removed from the App Store following its reported use during pro-democracy protests taking place in that country.
